Please attach the log file in question.

Good catch.
Fixed.
The problem was that the input stream reader was not created with 
encoding "UTF-8", so the cyrillic characters indicating the month were not 
read correctly and a date object could not be created.  This was causing  
session.getDate() to return null, and hence the NPE.
